attributes.action: Ban glue traps that cause excruciating pain and suffering to innocent animals
attributes.additional_details: So many animals suffer unnecessarily after being stuck to glue traps. This means that they suffer a long and painful death, slowly starving and scared beyond belief not knowing what is happening. No living creature should be put through this cruelty. There are more humane ways to deal with unwanted visitors in homes.
attributes.background: Make the selling and using of glue traps illegal to save the suffering of so many animals.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign this petition:

Make glue traps illegal within the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560288
